text: @PrisonPlanet @fozzer2006 Coronavirus is the result of either a manufactured chemical weapon, a result of cultural habits that are not only cruel but unhealthy, an attempt to cull certain members of the population or a mix of all 3. But it’s still the Chinese Virus
